title: Fort Vancouver National Historic Site: Maps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps      Â      Excerpt from historic map of Fort Vancouver from 1854. Army Corps of Engineers - Seattle  To facilitate your access to the park's units in Vancouver, Washington, and Oregon City, Oregon, two area maps are available by clicking on the links below: Fort Vancouver National Historic Site Area Map (548 KB .pdf file) McLoughlin House Area Map (456 KB .pdf file) Historic Reserve Area Map & Guide (520 KB .pdf file)
